analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/8/0x144c7c154fd9952217ac98d06f9bf9fce64d1fd7.sol#25-152) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/8/0x144c7c154fd9952217ac98d06f9bf9fce64d1fd7.sol#98-104)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x144c7c154fd9952217ac98d06f9bf9fce64d1fd7.sol:
	Contract DIGC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x144c7c154fd9952217ac98d06f9bf9fce64d1fd7.sol#201-203)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
